title: approxbayescomp — approxbayescomp
text: Approximate Bayesian Computation (ABC) statistical method fit Bayesian model data likelihood function hard compute. `approxbayescomp` package implements efficient form ABC — sequential Monte Carlo (SMC) algorithm. can handle general statistical problem, built models fitting insurance loss distributions particularly easy.

title: approxbayescomp — approxbayescomp
text: Pierre-Olivier Goffard, Patrick J. Laub (2021), Approximate Bayesian Computations fit compare insurance loss models, Insurance: Mathematics Economics, 100, pp. 350-371
